name: Kowtow Cleave
description: You slash your opponent after kowtowing so they let down their guard. The target must make a CHA save against your Move DC. On failure, the target takes 2d6 + MOVE dark damage, or half that damage on a successful save.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
